.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit NetworkInformationPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制对本地计算机的网络信息和通信统计信息的访问。

span.span: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限用于保护由命名空间中的类返回的数据 。This permission is used to secure data returned by the classes in the namespace. 对于声明性安全，请使用 类。For declarative security, use the class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个无限制的权限对象。The following example creates an unrestricted permission object. summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空或 为 ，则此新权限为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述它们共同描述的状态的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they both describe in common. 只有同时传递两个原始权限的请求才会传递交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个权限对象，该对象是现有权限对象的交集。The following example creates a permission object that is the intersection of existing permission objects. summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定了完全包含在指定权限中的状态，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 如果此方法返回 true，则当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限比指定权限更多。If this method returns true, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个权限之间的子集关系。The following code example displays the subset relationship between two permissions. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限合并的 权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是此权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of this permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个权限，该权限表示当前权限和指定权限所表示的所有状态。The method returns a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何传递任意权限的需求都将传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个权限对象，该对象是现有权限对象的并集。The following example creates a permission object that is the union of existing permission objects.
